data.app_name: The Pirate Queen with Lucy Liu
data.description:
Embark on an epic journey through the turbulent waters of history in "The Pirate Queen", with Lucy Liu üåü

![{"height":224,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38982662_7513468888773292_7586277367396825871_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=K-ttmz9FcFQQ7kNvgGOWbi_&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDUk1wJCLWFS8L-LE9mAa_tl5qZMMnXtVU-37_nX022Ag&oe=66B5FE1C)

Step into the boots of the legendary pirate Cheng Shih and see if you have what it takes to become history's most powerful pirate  üè¥‚Äç‚ò†Ô∏è


![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39036653_1456869748359051_7076517034930849202_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=ckHK5A8fvh0Q7kNvgGOtpC7&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAHWfKgxSRZuncAVN5s5sk7cbGhnuQ_wzInbMxnVVt1Lw&oe=66B607A4)


Travel back in time with this immersive story, perfect for explorers of all ages. Whether you're seeking a fresh adventure, yearning to escape into another world, or eager to unearth a hidden gem from history, this legend is for you.

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39003263_961033948683270_8273646164126363713_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=fQwyMPEQgo4Q7kNvgEikDsO&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYD8D27LcWBCDm_cPlUlc_9MA7_yeahJsbDyd0ZPWG3OlA&oe=66B5EF07)

With light gameplay elements, the focus is on the narrative. Dive into a story-rich experience lasting 1-4 hours ‚è≥, climb rigging, explore moonlit cabins üåô, unearth hidden artefacts, and exercise your wit to become leader of the Red Flag Fleet.  

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031579_801519894943640_3850714342256227051_n.png?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=NP0vP0wfztkQ7kNvgETGdp9&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBujWZlFVkXQuCZz2buruFbbVBptnXGTnztAqVQpI1-Kw&oe=66B5E1E6)

![{"height":231,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031400_1653444588750690_8451663376835143463_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=7LKC1UWaRY0Q7kNvgFsawQg&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYC8jsTryvag21S2yle4KHd7fsgBNg7z51k3RvvAljr02A&oe=66B60E58)

Celebrated for its cinematic story and historical environments, this non-combat experience has earned critical acclaim, winning the Tribeca Storyscapes Award (2023) & the Raindance Discovery Award (2021) üèÜ

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75322595_315227141608157_6664541123259039926_n.png?_nc_cat=104&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=H91XPlyjLMsQ7kNvgHwXh7N&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAPbkKuZRuJe7CkWhJXWAKEKMDWqXpCmM6HLEVakej42g&oe=66B60AD9)


![{"height":225,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974820_419365674368364_6471370540204954427_n.png?_nc_cat=106&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=p7d7bAO-6tIQ7kNvgHWpE26&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYB29hYDHkbLl0tyDFbryvNvbgCGzSfDHcYer2Ad0TACGw&oe=66B5F0F0)

Experience the captivating performance from Hollywood actress Lucy Liu üé≠, who brings Cheng Shih's character to life, under the direction of critically acclaimed filmmaker and creative director Eloise Singer üé¨


![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/57569455_779145490949371_5639970595016054333_n.png?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=4tYPdvdkamAQ7kNvgEalY9e&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDDudQ_FZClISw4LMOKUKgVm_O328afG961_03pE51QqQ&oe=66B5DB6A)

![{"height":244,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75593949_1392764491611640_7662168618929982906_n.png?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=p1q6hlVRgPkQ7kNvgFKLgV-&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCKqjTo94IdxxvPLmsHmTj8IaZazNdyUCOrZGeCG3kiaA&oe=66B5EF17)

Are you ready to turn the tides of history? Let's see how well you fare as The Pirate Queen! üè¥‚Äç‚ò†Ô∏èüëë



![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75251817_478868781249664_4666816330504461518_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=79pYAjBiAhMQ7kNvgHFf8CX&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBLyEZw0e2KetAYYvQKtv59BYnMkHHe_OeBnIBuId21pg&oe=66B60A8C)
